features.additionalInfo: You can use BPAY to pay bills bearing the BPAY logo from those accounts that have the BPAY facility.
Visa Debit card can be linked to your account. Not available to Business members . Max 1 card per individual single account.
Our secure Online Banking & Mobile App services mean access to your accounts 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
Pay faster, easier and more securely with Apple or Google Pay

features.additionalValue: SMS notifications for balance, debit, credit. $0.25 fee for notifications

features.additionalInfo: This account is able able to make and receive Osko payments
PayIDs can be linked with this account
Min $500 up to $20,000 $150 establishment fee. Subject to meeting credit policy approval

No charge  for transaction fees for withdrawals - owner ATM fees apply. 
Cheque book and card replacement fee still charged

eligibility.additionalInfo: This product is only available to members who have a residential address in Australia.

fees.name: Corporate Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per cheque when you request for us to issue a corporate cheque.

fees.name: Document Copies
fees.additionalInfo: Copies of documents other than statement - $5.00 per page  & $25.00 per hour This fee is applied where a Member requests copies  of documents such as loan forms or withdrawal forms.  The fee comprises a fee per page copied plus a fee per hour  or part thereof for the time involved in locating and copying  the documents. This fee will be charged at the time the  copies are provided.

fees.name: Dormant Account
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applied if a savings account has been classified as  a dormant account. An account can be classified as a dormant account if there have been no Member initiated transactions  for 12 months and we have followed procedures required  by our Constitution. This fee will be charged each year.

fees.name: Emerg Visa Replacement (O/S)
fees.additionalInfo:
Visa replacement card - US $175.00
Visa International can arrange for the issue of an emergency replacement card if your card is lost, stolen or damaged whilst
you are overseas. Visa International bills this charge to your Qudos Bank account.

fees.name: Member Chq Book Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you order or renew a book of Member cheques, the book includes 25 cheques.

fees.name: Overseas Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to foreign cheques deposited on behalf of Members, via Westpac or Western Union. This fee will be charged at the time of the deposit. > other than on a collection basis $20.00 (normally amounts under AUD$5,000) >on a collection basis $50.00 (normally amounts  AUD$5,000 and over)

fees.name: Replacement Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: First 2 cards free, then $10.00 per card.

fees.name: Statement Copies - <3 Mths Old
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applied when a Member requests a copy of a statement on an account for a period more than 3 months before the request. There is no charge for copies of statements less than 3 months  old. This fee will be charged at the time the copy is provided.

fees.name: Statement Copies
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applied when a Member requests a copy of a statement on an account for a period more than 3 months before the request. There is no charge for copies of statements less than 3 months  old. This fee will be charged at the time the copy is provided.

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer (Aust)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to telegraphic transfers on behalf of Members, arranged via Westpac. This fee will be charged at the time of the transfer.

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer (O/S)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to telegraphic transfers on behalf of Members, arranged via Western Union. This fee will be charged at the time of the transfer.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee_Direct Debit
fees.additionalInfo: Electronic Debit rejection fee.This fee is applied for each direct electronic debit rejected.  This fee will be charged at the time of the rejection.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee_ Inward and member Chq rejection
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applied for each cheque deposited to a Member's account which is subsequently rejected. This fee will be charged at the time of the rejection.

fees.name: International Transfer Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charge for International transfers via online banking or mobile app.

fees.name: SMS Banking
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to each SMS Banking message sent to your mobile phone. Note: This service is not to be mistaken with Qsafe SMS Authentication- which is a free service. The fee will be debited to your main savings account (S0) at the time the SMS is sent. Your telecommunications provider may also charge you a fee for sending and receiving SMS.

fees.name: Overseas card transactions
fees.additionalInfo: 3.65% of the value of the transactions. This fee applies to foreign currency transactions made using a CueCard or Visa Card, and includes a currency conversion assessment of 1% by Maestro Cirrus (for CueCard) or Visa International (for Visa cards), as applicable. For example, if the value of the transaction is $100, the fee would be $3.65 (including a currency conversion assessment of $1.00) Please note that some online merchants may display a price in Australian dollars but process the transaction ina foreign currency.

fees.name: Corporate cheque stop payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per cheque when you request for us to stop payment on a corporate cheque.

depositRates.additionalInfo: For balances between $0.00 and $4999.99, interest rate applicable is 0.00% pa
For balances between $5000.00 and $24,999.99, interest rate applicable is 0.00% pa
For balances between $25,00.00 and $49,999.99, interest rate applicable is 0.00% pa
For balances between $50,000 and $99,999.99, interest rate applicable is 0.05% pa
For balances between $100,000 and $249,999.99,  interest rate applicable is 0.05% pa
For balances between $250,000 and $499,999.99, interest rate applicable is 0.05% pa
For balances between $500,000 - $999,999.99, interest rate applicable is 0.05% pa
For balances $1 Million & over, interest rate applicable is 0.05% pa
